fields.name: Case_Close_Date_VCC
fields.fieldText: Case Close Date:

fields.name: Date_Referrer_Informed_of_Case_Closure
fields.fieldText: Date Referrer Informed of Case Closure:

fields.name: Completion_Status
fields.fieldText: Completion Status

fields.name: Case_Closure_Notes_VCC
fields.fieldText: Case Closure Notes (Optional)

fields.name: CareConnectClosureText
fields.fieldText: You will now be directed to enter the Final Session for this case. Please press "Next".

fields.name: CaseUpdated
fields.fieldText: The case has been closed successfully.

fields.name: CaseUpdated_CC
fields.fieldText:
Have you completed the PWI?


Please ensure that you complete the closing PWI after closing the case.


The case has been closed successfully.

screens.description: Fields that need to be entered in order to close a case.
screens.name: Case_Closure_Fields
screens.label: Case Closure Fields

fields.name: CaseFlowText
fields.fieldText:
Please enter the following fields in order to close the case.

Press Finish once all fields have been entered.

fields.name: Case_Close_Date
fields.fieldText: Case Close Date

fields.name: Case_Closure_Notes
fields.fieldText: Case Closure Notes (Optional)

fields.name: CCD_Enquiry_Text
fields.fieldText:
Case Closure Date is before the Enquiry/Referral Date:


The Case Closure Date cannot come before the Enquiry/Referral Date of the Case.

Please return to the previous page using the "Previous" button to enter an appropriate closure date.

fields.name: CollectionPeriodFailureText
fields.fieldText: All collection periods must be completed (100%) before you can close the case.

fields.name: Completion_Status_Text
fields.fieldText:
Episode Completion not Closed


When the case is closed Completion Status must be recorded using one of the ‘Episode closed’ responses.

Please return to the previous page and choose one of the Episode End responses.

fields.name: EnquiryProgramText
fields.fieldText:
No Program


This Enquiry has no program.

Please select one from the list below:

fields.name: NoNotesText
fields.fieldText:
No Notes Entered:


You have selected "Other (specify in notes) as the Reason for Case Closure but have note added any notes in the Case Closure Notes.

Please return to the previous page using the "Previous" button to enter notes.

fields.name: NoNotesTextCC
fields.fieldText:
No Notes Entered:


You have selected "Other (specify in notes) as the Reason for Case Closure but have note added any notes in the Case Closure Notes.

Please return to the previous page using the "Previous" button to enter notes.

fields.name: NoProgramText
fields.fieldText:
This Case does not have a Program.

Please go to Case Details and select a Program in order to close the case.

fields.name: OPPDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Input the Reason for Closure for this Opportunity Pathways Case:

fields.name: OPPReasonForLeaving
fields.fieldText: Reason for Leaving Program

fields.name: Fault_Text
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong :(


Please review the below text, it may explain the problem in a way you can fix by pressing "Previous" and changing your entered data. Otherwise, please screenshot this error, and open a helpdesk ticket.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: Fields that need to be entered in order to close a case.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_CaseFlowText

Press Finish once all fields have been entered.

fields.name: Case_Close_Date_The_Bridge

fields.name: Cessation_Reason

fields.name: Referral_to_Another_Service

fields.name: Case_Closure_Notes_Optional_The_Bridge
fields.fieldText: Case Closure Notes (Optional)
